title: Ethiopia says Tigrayan forces beaten in Afar, Tigrayans say they redeployed
content:
1. Ethiopia says Tigrayan forces beaten in Afar, Tigrayans say they redeployed  Reuters
  2. Sudan and Ethiopia trade accusations over weapons and bodies as tensions mount  Middle East Eye
  3. Eye on Africa - 125 Ethiopian civilians allegedly massacred in Amhara region  FRANCE 24
  4. Tigray forces accused of killing 120 villagers  Reuters
  5. TDF denies killing 120 civilians in Amhara, dismisses reports as "fabrications"  Garowe Online
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: エチオピアはティグラヤ軍がアファールで殴られたと言っているが、ティグラヤ軍は再配置されたと言っている。
